title: @Riot KateyKhaos With all these funny, reversed, dark, light skins... (Karma)
body: Can we actually have an evil skin for Karma finally? Karma players haven't seen a single comment from Riot Games about the topic. It's the biggest dream of Karma's little fanbase.
